channel.title: [317] How do you change the location of the characters folder?
channel.description: Hello, I am releasing a new private server this friday, (Saving up for vps) and i wanted to put on 4 different worlds people can log on to. I wanted these 4 different servers to point to the same characters folder. How do I do this? Thanks in advance- Josdog

item.title: [317] How do you change the location of the characters folder?
item.dc:creator: @josdog josdog
item.description:

Hello, I am releasing a new private server this friday, (Saving up for vps) and i wanted to put on 4 different worlds people can log on to. I wanted these 4 different servers to point to the same characters folder. How do I do this? Thanks in advance- Josdog
